casebody.data:
James ARNOLD and Leah Metcalf individually, and on behalf of all others similarly situated
v.
The UNIVERSITY OF NORTH CAROLINA AT CHAPEL HILL No. 163P17 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 17, 2017 Geraldine Sumter, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, Cyrus Mehri, Attorney at Law, N. Jeremi Duru, Attorney at Law, for Arnold, James, et al. Tiffany N. Mack, Attorney at Law, Charlotte. Stephanie A. Brennan, Special Deputy Attorney General, Lisa Gilford, Attorney at Law, Amy Van Gelder, Attorney at Law, for The University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 23rd of May 2017 by Plaintiffs in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th of August 2017."

Ervin, J. recused
